categories: Category:Imperial-class Star Destroyers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Impenetrable was the personal Imperial-class Star Destroyer of Grand Admiral Danetta Pitta. It was presumably part of Pitta's fleet at the Battle of Tralus, where he was killed.
Daniel Wallace originally named the Impenetrable in a segment of his Grand Admirals article that was cut. It received an entry five years later in The Complete Star Wars Encyclopedia.
